alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Kay; Noble (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 4:21AM CDT until July 21 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Kay County in northern Oklahoma... Noble County in northern Oklahoma... Northeastern Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 421 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles west of Billings to 9 miles north of Lucien to 3 miles north of Orlando, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Ponca City, Perry, Morrison, Billings, Red Rock, Marland, Lucien, Sooner Lake, and Ceres. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
